entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
